name: Mosley Lodovico
description:
Hi my name is Mosley Lodovico,how are you doing,i guess you had a productive day out there today?i saw your profile and i found it very interesting.I would like to correspond with you and get to know more about each other..
I am a single dad originally from Germany but have been living in the United States for years now,i am a single dad of two lovely kids who means the world to me.I am a construction engineer into building,remodeling of houses/construction of roads and bridges.
I am a very honest,loving,caring,understanding,creative,sensitive,down to earth person with good sense of humor.who has a lot of love to offer to the right person.I do treat people the way i want to be treated.Your profile is so refreshing, everything you wrote interest me,You also look so gentle and kind,i could not pass by so that is why i emailed you,so we can get to know each other.I better stop now and wait to hear back from you.
Warm regards,
Mosley Lodovico
